creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com
text:
I am trying to use the weblogic drivers for ORACLE and I am unable to use it 
inside ANT unless I put the weblogic jars in the CLASSPATH environment 
variable. If I use the <classpath> entry it will not load the drivers 
successfully.

It says it cannot find the package version.

I supposed you are talking about jDriver, right ?
Could you please at least give:
- the weblogic version
- the exact error message
- the sample <sql> task
creator: sbailliez@apache.org

text:
Since this was filed I moved on to ANT 1.5 (due to bugfixes in other tasks)
things seem to be working fine since.

So it seems any problem in ANT 1.3 was solved.
creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com
